info.title: RevRing Voice AI API
info.description: RevRing Voice AI platform API for managing AI voice agents, phone calls, SIP trunks, and analytics. Build intelligent voice applications that can handle inbound and outbound phone calls with AI-powered conversational agents.

tags.name: SIP Trunks
tags.description: Manage SIP trunks for connecting agents to the phone network

tags.name: Agents
tags.description: Manage AI voice agents and their configuration

tags.name: Analytics
tags.description: Get analytics and metrics about your calls

get.description: Retrieve all SIP trunks for your organization. SIP trunks connect your AI agents to the phone network.

post.description: Create a new SIP trunk. Provide phone numbers that will route through this trunk.

get.description: Retrieve a specific SIP trunk by ID

patch.description: Update SIP trunk configuration including phone numbers

delete.description: Delete a SIP trunk. Cannot delete if agents are using it.

get.description: Retrieve all AI voice agents for your organization

post.description: Create a new AI voice agent with specified configuration

409.description: Conflict - Resource already exists or invalid trunk

400.description: Bad request - Invalid body or invalid trunk

get.description: Get phone numbers assigned to an agent for inbound calls

post.description: Assign a phone number to an agent

delete.description: Remove a phone number from an agent

get.description: Get custom tools configured for an agent

post.description: Add a custom tool that the agent can invoke via function calling

delete.description: Remove a custom tool from an agent

get.description: List calls with filtering, sorting, and pagination

post.description: Initiate an outbound call with an agent

get.description: Get analytics overview with time-series data and summary cards
Get the current number of active (ongoing) calls. Not affected by date filters.

post.description: Called before an inbound call is answered. Return variables to be merged with the agent's default variables for this call.

variables.description: Additional variables to merge with agent defaults

post.description: Called after a call ends with complete call details including transcript, recording, and summary.

hangupCause.description: Reason call ended. Common values: USER_ENDED, END_CALL_TOOL, SILENCE_TIMEOUT, MAX_DURATION, VOICEMAIL_DETECTED

apiKeyAuth.name: x-api-key
apiKeyAuth.description: API key for authentication. Generate API keys from the RevRing dashboard.

UnauthorizedError.description: Authentication required or API key invalid

SipTrunk.description: SIP Trunk for routing phone calls

cloud.description: Phone numbers associated with this trunk

updatedAt.description: When this trunk was last updated

SipTrunkCreate.description: Create a new SIP Trunk. Provide the proxy address and phone numbers.

password.description: SIP authentication password (not returned in responses)

cloud.description: Phone numbers to associate with this trunk

SipTrunkUpdate.description: Update SIP Trunk. Only phone numbers can be modified after creation.

cloud.description: Update phone numbers associated with this trunk

turnTimeoutSeconds.description: Seconds to wait for user response

llmTemperature.description: LLM temperature for response randomness (0 = deterministic, 2 = very creative)

preCallWebhookUrl.description: Webhook URL called before answering inbound calls

postCallWebhookUrl.description: Webhook URL called after call ends with transcript and recording

endCallEnabled.description: Allow agent to end the call

endCallRulesOverride.description: Custom instructions for when agent should end call

condition.description: When to offer this transfer option

voicemailAction.description: What to do when voicemail is detected

voicemailMessage.description: Message to leave on voicemail (if action is leave_message)

voiceId.description: Voice ID (copy from dashboard Voice Library)

voiceSpeed.description: Speech speed multiplier (0.5 = half speed, 1.5 = 1.5x speed)

phoneNumbers.description: Phone numbers assigned to this agent for inbound calls

customTools.description: Custom function calling tools available to this agent

AgentCreate.description: Create a new AI voice agent

sipTrunkId.description: SIP trunk ID to use for this agent's calls

status.description: Agent status (active = can receive calls, disabled = inactive)

turnTimeoutSeconds.description: Seconds to wait for user response (-1 = no timeout)

silenceEndCallTimeoutSeconds.description: Silence duration before ending call (-1 = no timeout)

postCallWebhookUrl.description: Webhook URL called after call ends (optional)

voiceId.description: Voice ID (copy from dashboard Voice Library)

AgentUpdate.description: Update an existing AI voice agent. All fields are optional.

sipTrunkId.description: SIP trunk ID to use for this agent's calls

status.description: Agent status (active = can receive calls, disabled = inactive)

turnTimeoutSeconds.description: Seconds to wait for user response (-1 = no timeout)

silenceEndCallTimeoutSeconds.description: Silence duration before ending call (-1 = no timeout)

postCallWebhookUrl.description: Webhook URL called after call ends (optional)

voiceId.description: Voice ID (copy from dashboard Voice Library)

AgentCustomTool.description: Custom function calling tool for agents

schema.description: OpenAI function schema (can be null to remove)

agentCallerIdName.description: Caller ID name shown to recipient

agentName.description: Name of the agent that handled this call

recordingUrl.description: URL to call recording (available after call ends)

hangupCause.description: Reason call ended. Common values: USER_ENDED, END_CALL_TOOL, SILENCE_TIMEOUT, MAX_DURATION, VOICEMAIL_DETECTED

startedAt.description: When call was answered (null if never answered)

endedAt.description: When call ended (null if still ongoing)

durationSeconds.description: Call duration in seconds (null if never answered)

total.description: Total number of calls matching filters

hasNextPage.description: Whether there are more pages available

activeCalls.description: Current active calls (not affected by filters)
